item.title: Author
item.value: Simon Wacker, Martin Heidegger, Michael Hermann

classDescription.summary: BasicInterface is the basic interface for each class in the As2lib Framework.
classDescription.restOfDescription:
It is recommended to always implement this interface in the classes of your own project but it is not a necessity. You can use all functionalities of the As2lib Framework without implementing it.

It enables you to call the toString method on instances that have been casted to interfaces.

The default implementation BasicClass offers an enhanced toString method implementation that returns a better string representation than the default Object#toString method of Flash.

description.text: Returns the string representation of this instance.

field.title: Returns
field.description: the string representation of this instance
